name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer, but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: The ID of the DomainBlock in the database.

name: domain
description: Description: The domain that is not allowed to federate.

name: created_at
description: Description: When the domain was blocked from federating.

name: severity
description: Description: The policy to be applied by this domain block.

name: reject_media
description: Description: Whether to reject media attachments from this domain

name: reject_reports
description: Description: Whether to reject reports from this domain
